channel.title: dm_1337_street (A remake of the 1337_street map of HL1DM)
channel.description:
Hello everyone. I think we all remember the picture of HL1 1337_street. I would like to present this map for BM and to hear from you assess and suggestions on map. The map is in the alpha state. Original map for HL1 [img='https://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/270587945638464317/054E9BD6B028865F69551CFB8E41453C327B7B81/',left,598][/img]
Map for BM WIP
[img='https://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/270587945638464974/6CA74D56A7A4E4ACFAE7919DCDB3CA78F7A55D6F/',left,600][/img]
[img='https://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/270587945638481347/99C43B485F798484A8C455E8130C8745991DC090/',left,602][/img]
[img='https://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/270587945638466545/BD9B1FF14007B39FE3FCFAB09AE0D4E31150FF52/',left,604][/img]
[img='https://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/270587945638466227/F07BC8EC5F666C550B84358EFB6C55657BF456A8/',left,613][/img]
[img='https://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/270587945638466401/C22020E3C94CC0585F42718BB69792E95D278570/',left,624][/img]
While all . :wink:

item.dc:creator: MDL
item.description:
Hello all again. I continue to develop the map. I decided to share with you the latest screenshots.
At present there is a refinement of detail and optimization map.

In conclusion I would like to ask you, whether the normal light and the brightness on the map?

[/size]
